import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' const CartItems = () => { // zwdna missing { for function body const {all_product, cartItems, removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); // sl7t el naming from CartItems to cartItems return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product && all_product.map((e) => { // Fixed: Added null check for all_product 3shan lw l cart fadya mytl3sh error if(cartItems[e.id] > 0) { return (

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

${e.new_price * cartItems[e.id]}

removeFromCart(e.id)} alt="Remove" // Fixed: zwdt alt text />
) } return null; // Fixed: Added explicit return null for items not in cart })}

cart Totals

Subtotal

${0}

Shipping Fee

Free

Total

${0}

) } export default CartItems
